mapper.delete: delete from withview where mno=#{mno} and ctno=#{ctno}
mapper.select: select cp.ctno, cp.bkno, cp.cust_img, cp.cust_rec, m.name, bp.mbkno, bp.bk_page, bp.bk_cont, bp.bk_img, bp.bk_rec, cb.mno, cb.ct_dscp, cb.ct_date, cb.ct_public, mb.mbk_titl, mb.mbk_cont from custpage cp inner join bkpage bp on cp.bkno = bp.bkno inner join custbook cb on cp.ctno = cb.ctno left outer join mstbook mb on mb.mbkno = bp.mbkno left outer join member m on cb.mno = m.mno where cb.ct_public="no" and cp.bkno= 1 limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
select mno, ctno, rmnd from withview where mno= #{mno}

select cp.ctno, cp.bkno, cp.cust_img, cp.cust_rec, bp.bk_page, bp.bk_cont, bp.bk_img, bp.bk_rec, cb.ct_dscp, mb.mbk_titl from custpage cp inner join bkpage bp on cp.bkno = bp.bkno inner join custbook cb on cp.ctno = cb.ctno left outer join mstbook mb on mb.mbkno = bp.mbkno where cp.ctno = 1
